column4: can anyone explain ./configure --prefix=/usr to me?  the "--prefix=/usr" part of the command doesnt make sense to me
It means: yo, program! I want you to install everything in /usr, so your libs will be in /usr/lib, executables in /usr/bin/, etc.
By default, programs installed from source use the /usr/local prefix -> /usr/local/lib/, /usr/local/bin/, etc.
